summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated July 23, 2019. It includes inmate count sheets, rosters, and out-count forms, showing the facility's population and housing assignments. The documents list several inmates, including Jeffrey Epstein, who was housed in unit H01-001L.

events.title: Daily Prison Count and Roster
events.description: Administrative count and roster of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, showing housing assignments and population totals.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on July 23, 2019, with registration number 76318-054.
Epstein was housed in unit H01-001L and his assignment category was listed as 'ATTY'.
The documents show a total inmate population count of 776 and an out-count of 761 on July 23, 2019.
The administrative forms include detailed housing unit assignments for multiple inmates, indicating standard prison record-keeping procedures.
The date of these records is significant as it is approximately three weeks prior to Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
